the crowd of family and friends was prepared for the ceremony .

violins we 're played to aid the ears of the participants .

output.sentences: Of course the best friends needed to have their graduation day photos taken together.
They would sit side by side, waiting for their names to be called to finally claim their degrees.
Sadly, almost immediately afterword, the distance between the great friends began to grow, adulthood pulling them in their various directions as it often does.
To their individual parties, to celebrations in different areas.
Until finally, they realized, they were alone.
